entry.title: Using gropuby to remove 'data islands'
entry.content: As anyone who has worked with measurement data knows, there will always be some missing and errornous data, hence quality checking is an essential step. However, quality control methods remove data and don’t always detect everything, often resulting in many short periods of questionable data called ‘data islands’. In this blog post, I’ll show you how you can remove data islands, based on a threshold minimum period length.

entry.title: pvlib - a one stop source for solar resource data
